graphql.query:
query GetAllPendingBls {
  getAllPendingBls {
    _id
    businessCode
    document
    documentNumber
    TerminalOpsId
    doStatus {
      status
      TerminalOpsId
      comment
      documents {
        payOrder
        underTakings
        blStamped
        loloReceipt
        goodsDeclaration
      }
      statusNumber
      timestamp
    }
    doOfficeInfo {
      account
      arrivedDate
      bank
      charges
      doDate
      houseBL
      securityDeposit
      gatePassAttachment
      doAttachment
      detention
      title
      doBroker
      containerOtherCharges
      readyToMove
      rtmTS
      DoFinances {
        addedOn
        lastUpdated
        detentionFrom
        detentionTo
        transportFrom
        transportTo
        advInvoiceDate
        detInvoiceDate
        detentionRemarks
        detentionAmount
        claimBy
        totalCharges
        commercialComments
        endorsement
        charges
        loloCharges
        lateDO
        advanceDOIssuance
        shortPayment
        advanceRent
        advRemarks
        transportDays
        detentionDays
        attachments
        advInvoiceNo
        detInvoiceNo
        perDayCharges
        chargeableTo
        advanceInvoices
        detentionInvoices
        chargeSplit {
          clientDays
          clientAmount
          vendorDays
          vendorAmount
        }
        holdStatuses {
          TerminalOpsId
          status
          commentBox
          timestamp
        }
      }
    }
    shippingLine
    status
    pendingNo
    returnDT
    gatePassDocument
    containerNumber
    createdBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query GetAllTerminalOps {
  getAllTerminalOps {
    _id
    User {
      _id
      firstName
      lastName
      phoneNumber
      email
      profileImage
      cnic
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      UserType {
        _id
        userType
      }
    }
    PendingBls {
      _id
      TerminalOpsId
      document
      documentNumber
      doStatus {
        status
        TerminalOpsId
        comment
        documents {
          payOrder
          underTakings
          blStamped
          loloReceipt
          goodsDeclaration
        }
        statusNumber
        timestamp
      }
      doOfficeInfo {
        account
        arrivedDate
        bank
        charges
        doDate
        houseBL
        securityDeposit
        gatePassAttachment
        doAttachment
        detention
        title
        doBroker
        containerOtherCharges
        readyToMove
        rtmTS
        DoFinances {
          addedOn
          lastUpdated
          detentionFrom
          detentionTo
          transportFrom
          transportTo
          advInvoiceDate
          detInvoiceDate
          detentionRemarks
          detentionAmount
          claimBy
          totalCharges
          commercialComments
          endorsement
          charges
          loloCharges
          lateDO
          advanceDOIssuance
          shortPayment
          advanceRent
          advRemarks
          transportDays
          detentionDays
          attachments
          advInvoiceNo
          detInvoiceNo
          perDayCharges
          chargeableTo
          advanceInvoices
          detentionInvoices
          chargeSplit {
            clientDays
            clientAmount
            vendorDays
            vendorAmount
          }
          holdStatuses {
            TerminalOpsId
            status
            commentBox
            timestamp
          }
        }
      }
      shippingLine
      status
      pendingNo
      returnDT
      gatePassDocument
      containerNumber
      createdBy
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
    DoStatuses {
      _id
      status
      OrderId
      TerminalOpsId
      comment
      statusNumber
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
    isBlocked
    platform
    type
    platformInfo {
      versionCode
      versionName
      userPlatform
    }
    notifToken
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}
